arts.ttl: QPR sink Watford as Argyle dig out last-gasp leveller to deny Bristol City
arts.sum: Michael Frey sparks 3-1 victory for QPR at Loftus Road Plymouth claim 2-2 draw in first game since Rooney exit QPR continued their march up the Championship table under Martí Cifuentes as Michael Frey announced his return to the side after injury with a goal in a 3-1 win over Watford at Loftus Road. The former Schalke and Fenerbahce forward had been out since mid-October with a calf injury but made an emphatic comeback on his first start in more than two months with a goal to give his side the lead after only five minutes.
